name: KingdomMaster - Fall 2017 - 470
description:
You are a ruler of your own kingdom. Being a ruler comes with benefits and challenges. Your scouts have found several barbarian camps near your kingdom and they look like they are ready to pillage your kingdom. With the villagers and resources at your disposal, you must create more resources, build up your defenses, and upgrade your capital to fend the vicious barbarian invaders.

As the player you start off with a capital, a house, some villagers, and small amount of resources. You must build resource-producing buildings, more houses to increase your population, and build soldier units to fend off waves of barbarians that want to destroy your kingdom. The goal is to upgrade your capital through a number of tiers until you get to tier 3. Once you get to Tier 3, you win the game!!! You must get to tier 3 before the barbarians destroy your capital otherwise its game over for you
